font.span: Welcome to Wells-Ogunquit Community School District

div.i: "The Wells-Ogunquit C.S.D. commits to ensuring that each scholar develops the social, academic, critical and creative thinking skills necessary to meet with success in college,
career, citizenship and life. The responsibility for education is shared by student, family, school and community."

font.a: More information from the Maine CDC

p.font: A message from the WHS Baseball Team

div.font: Additional Resources for Parents Around COVID-19

font.span: Just a reminder that although the school buildings throughout the district remain closed at this time, you are still encouraged to register your child for the upcoming school year. If you are new to the district or are registering for Kindergarten for the fall,

. Once you have completed the online portion of the registration, you will be directed to collect and drop off additional paperwork to the school. Please hold off on this step until the schools reopen. We will communicate a process with you for collecting paperwork when it is safe to do so.
